item.description:
Come out and join me for some Korea food.
There are many options available at Korean Garden.
Korean BBQ, banchan, tofu soup, Bibimbap, and more!

If people are interested, after dinner we can go grab some drink Korean Style at Myung Dong down the street.

Bringing some cash will help with paying the bill.

Because of the popularity of the event, please RSVP if you know for sure you can make it and keep it updated if your plans change ASAP. To accommodate a large group, the restaurant has asked us to show up on time, so please plan ahead and try not to be late and keep in mind that parking is quite difficult in the area.

If you have any questions, you can reach me at 617-955-6000.

How to get there.

Take B train (greenline) to Harvard Ave stop and walk 2 blocks towards Brighton Ave.

If you drive, parking is always tough in that neighborhood. Sometimes there are more spaces toward Super 88 Market.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Korean dinner!
